title: Newspaper Issues Apology As Readers Can’t Believe What Made It Into Print
description: As one paper is forced to apologize for accidental AI in a recent printed story, newsrooms globally are grappling with the rapid rise of artificial intelligence.
content:
Pakistan’s leading English-language daily, Dawn, issued a public apology on Tuesday after accidentally printing an AI-generated editing prompt inside one of its business stories.
The mistake appeared in the November 12 print edition in a report title... [3751 chars]

title: MicroCloud Hologram Inc. Releases Next-Generation Quantum Convolutional Neural Network Multi-Class Classification Technology, Driving Quantum Machine Learning Towards Practicalization
description: SHENZHEN, China, Nov. 15, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- MicroCloud Hologram Inc. (NASDAQ: HOLO), ('HOLO' or the 'Company'), a technology service provider, has launched a groundbreaking technological achievement-a multi-class classification method based on the Quantum Convolutional Neural Network (QCNN) using hybrid quantum-classical learning. This method not only demonstrates the enormous potential of quantum computing in image recognition and complex classification tasks but also provides a new path for the development of artificial intelligence in the post-Moore era.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - Global Markets Stumble Amid Fed Rate Anxiety and AI Concerns
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Anthropic Warns: China Linked to AI-Driven Hacking Campaign
description: In what they say is the first reported use of artificial intelligence to direct a hacking campaign in a largely automated fashion, a team of researchers has made a concerning discovery.
content:
A team of researchers has uncovered what they say is the first reported use of artificial intelligence to direct a hacking campaign in a largely automated fashion.

title: Morgan Freeman Takes Stand Against AI Impersonation of His Iconic Voice
description: Morgan Freeman strongly opposes the use of artificial intelligence to mimic his distinct voice, highlighting ongoing legal efforts to combat unauthorized uses. Having expressed his frustration, Freeman appreciates fan support. As AI techniques advance, other celebrities like Scarlett Johansson are also voicing their concerns.
content: In a bold stand against the misuse of artificial intelligence, Hollywood legend Morgan Freeman is taking vigorous action to protect his iconic voice and image. Speaking candidly with The Guardian, Freeman revealed that his legal team is busily addres... [812 chars]

content:

title: Apple and OpenAI must face X Corp's lawsuit for now - US judge
description: APPLE and ChatGPT maker OpenAI on Thursday failed to convince a federal judge to dismiss a lawsuit by Elon Musk’s X Corp accusing them of conspiring to monopolize markets for smartphones and generative artificial intelligence (AI) chatbots.

title: QUOTE BOX Walmart names insider Furner as CEO McMillon's successor, Wall Street reacts
description: Walmart on Friday announced that CEO Doug McMillon will retire next year and will be succeeded by insider and company veteran John Furner at a time when retailers navigate new challenges such as artificial intelligence and global tariffs.
content:
Walmart shares were down nearly 2% in early trading, as some analysts noted McMillon's retirement could have come earlier than expected. McMillon has led the world's largest retailer for over a decade.

title: AI's influence on discovery and creativity
description: THE Heidelberg Laureate Forum, a confluence of brilliant minds in mathematics and computer science, recently fostered a captivating discussion on the burgeoning role of artificial intelligence (AI) in research and beyond. While AI’s capabilities are undeniable, the insights of young researchers reveal a nuanced perspective, balancing excitement with caution about its impact on creativity and the very essence of human discovery.
